class.name: zsync_msg
class.title: the API which is used to comminicate with user interface clients

class:
This is the public protocol/api for communication with user interface clients.
zsync_api = (REQ_STATE RES_STATE) /= UPDATE /= REQ_FILES /= (REQ_CHUNK RES_CHUNK)
Requests the current state.
Responds to REQ_STATE with current state.
Requests an update for all changes with a newer state then 'state'.
UUID that identifies the sender List of updated files and their metadata Sends a list of updated files to the client.
UUID that identifies the receiver List of file names Total size of all files in bytes Requests a list of files from receiver.
Path of file that the 'chunk' belongs to Size of the requested chunk in bytes File offset for for the chunk in bytes Requests a chunk of 'chunk_size' data from 'path' at 'offset'.
Requested chunk Responds with the requested chunk.
This chunk is part of the file at 'path' Path of file that the 'chunk' belongs to Defines which chunk of the file at 'path' this is! Offset for this 'chunk' in bytes Sends one 'chunk' of data of a file at the 'path'.
UUID that identifies the receiver
Sends an abort for one file at path.
Terminate all worker threads.
